entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero except minus 4 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over the Highlands. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero except minus 4 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
